meta.job_title: Governance and Civil Society Associate Director

duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a Technical Lead in the development of proposals, including proposal writing, leading the project design, conducting reconnaissance trips, and securing partners.
Lead the development of an approach and institutionalize a practice to collate leading practices, lessons learned, stories, and results on implemented projects.
Lead the production of knowledge papers and packaging of tools to reflect leading practices per year, working closely with the Communication Department and the Project Management Unit.
Represent at conferences and public events to share leading practices, lessons learned, and knowledge extracted from ongoing projects.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in International Development or related field
